articles.title: GIFT Nifty up 45 points; here's the trading setup for today's session - The Economic Times
articles.description: Global cues are muted as most of the Asian markets are closed for this week on account of Lunar New Year holidays, which kept global investors on side-line. Overall we expect the market to consolidate with negative bias in the near term,  said Siddhartha Khem…
articles.content: Domestic equities opened positive on the first day of the week but soon witnessed selling pressure amid muted global cues. In today's trade, markets will react to the inflation data, which fell to a … [+3055 chars]
